## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G47690](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G47690)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtEB1a, ATEB1H2, EB1A</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA MICROTUBULE END BINDING PROTEIN EB1A, ATEB1-HOMOLOG2, microtubule end binding protein EB1A
- **Description:**   microtubule end binding protein EB1A;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2100417
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [eb1a-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;When plants are grown on inclined agar plates root growth is skewed to the left forming clockwise loops with twisted epidermal cell files.
